name: Binary Dungeon (Revolution Game)
description:
BINARY DUNGEON Background Story:
It sets place in a dungeon (kind of obvious) and you are here to reclaim your missing heart! A really short game to experiment on the art style of a binary number. The game itself is pretty simple but still, give it a try! How To Play? Sorry to say that there isn't any tutorial inside the game, so you probably gonna discover it yourself or observe it there.
  • WASD - The basic movement
  • Left Mouse Button - Perform the action of attacking
  • Right Mouse Button - Performing a special attack
Feel free to give any feedback in the comments! (Even though it is unlikely for me to make modification) You can also join my discord server.
